dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Container Launcher for E4S containers, facilitating MPI library
translations
dependent_to.name: e4s-cl

dependent_to.description:
Python Fire is a library for automatically generating command line
interfaces (CLIs) with a single line of code.
dependent_to.name: py-fire

dependent_to.description:
An interactive NVIDIA-GPU process viewer and beyond, the one-stop
solution for GPU process management.
dependent_to.name: py-nvitop

dependent_to.description:
A source-to-source Fortran compiler designed to programmatically
optimise, parallelise and instrument HPC applications (written in
Fortran) via user- provided transformation scripts. Additionally,
PSyclone supports the development of kernel-based, Fortran-embedded DSLs
and is used in the UK Met Office's next-generation modelling system,
LFRic.
dependent_to.name: py-psyclone

dependent_to.description: TensorFlow is an open source machine learning framework for everyone.
dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow

dependent_to.description:
tensorflow/datasets is a library of datasets ready to use with
TensorFlow.
dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-datasets

dependent_to.description: Generate simple tables in terminals from a nested list of strings.
dependent_to.name: py-terminaltables

dependent_to.description: ROCPROFILER library for AMD HSA runtime API extension support
dependent_to.name: rocprofiler-dev

description: ANSII Color formatting for output in terminal.
name: py-termcolor
